Uses of Package
it.polimi.ingsw.common.backend.model.cardrequirements

Packages that use it.polimi.ingsw.common.backend.model.cardrequirements
Package
Description
it.polimi.ingsw.common.backend.model
Classes that implement the model of the server of the Masters of Renaissance game.
it.polimi.ingsw.common.backend.model.cardrequirements
This package contains the implementation of the card requirements of Masters of Renaissance.
it.polimi.ingsw.common.backend.model.leadercards
This package contains the implementation of the leader cards of Masters of Renaissance.
  • Classes in it.polimi.ingsw.common.backend.model.cardrequirements used by it.polimi.ingsw.common.backend.model
    Class
    Description
    ResourceRequirement
    A concrete requirement for leader card activation.
  • Classes in it.polimi.ingsw.common.backend.model.cardrequirements used by it.polimi.ingsw.common.backend.model.cardrequirements
    Class
    Description
    CardRequirement
    Leader cards can be activated only if the player owns enough of either: Development cards of a certain color/level Resources of a specified kind
    CardRequirementsNotMetException
    Exception signaling that the player being examined does not meet the specified requirements.
    DevCardRequirement.Entry
    Models a requirement entry.
